com.pos.device.picc

Class PiccReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.picc.PiccReader

  • public final class PiccReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the operating about contactless card.

    such as:mifare one card(S50，S70)，mifare desfire card, mifare ultralight card, mifare pro cad.etc.

    Created by NP-JAY on 2016/10/25.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PiccReader getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of PiccReader().
        Returns:
        returns the singleton instance of PiccReader().

      • release

        public void release()
             throws SDKException
        To release the contactless card reader if you do't use the card.

        Call this method will close the device file descriptor of contactless card reader.

        Throws:
        SDKException

      • reset

        public void reset()
           throws SDKException
        To reset the contactless card reader.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(PiccTimeout piccTimeout)
                throws SDKException
        To set the timeout with special parameters.
        Parameters:
        piccTimeout - the timeout to set.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • getTimeout

        public PiccTimeout getTimeout()
                       throws SDKException
        To get the timeout.
        Returns:
        returns the timeout.
        Throws:
        SDKException

      • startSearchCard

        public void startSearchCard(int timeoutMs,
                   PiccReaderCallback piccReaderCallbak)
        To search the contactless card in timeout range, the result will be told by PiccReaderCallback.onSearchResult(int, int)
        Parameters:
        timeoutMs - The timeout(milliseconds) spent to search contactless Card, if the timeout <= 0, it presents that will not be timeout in searching card instead of canceled by user.
        piccReaderCallbak - The callback of result.

      • startSearchCard

        public void startSearchCard(int timeoutMs,
                   byte[] cardType,
                   PiccReaderCallback piccReaderCallbak)

      • stopSearchCard

        public void stopSearchCard()
        To stop search contactless card.

      • getATQ

        public byte[] getATQ()
        Get the ATQ data (for Type A or Type B card).
        Returns:
        returns the ATQ data.

      • getATS

        public byte[] getATS()
        Get the ATS of CPU type A card.
        Returns:
        returned the ATS.

      • getSAK

        public int getSAK()
        Get the SAK (only for Type A card).
        Returns:
        returns the SAK value if success, else fail if returned -1.

      • selectCarrierType

        public int selectCarrierType(int type)
        To set the carrier type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type is MIF_TYPE_A,MIF_TYPE_B,MIF_TYPE_C1 or MIF_TYPE_C2
        Returns:
        return 0 if success else failed.

      • writeRegister

        public void writeRegister(byte addr,
                 byte value)
        Write contactless chip register. Some register address can not be written, or even cause contactless error. Please read the contactless chip manual for details before writing register.
        Parameters:
        addr - the register address to write
        value - the value to write at the register address

      • readRegister

        public byte readRegister(byte addr)
        Read contactless chip register.
        Parameters:
        addr - the register address to read
        Returns:
        return the value at the register address

      • getChipType

        public int getChipType()
        Get contactless chip type.
        Returns:
        return the contactless chip type.
